message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a unique asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1100000. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $800000. I'm interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

I understand that you have a budget constraint, Bob, but I'm afraid $800000 is below my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $950000. This is the lowest I can go, and I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $800000. I'm willing to go up to $850000. I think that's a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.

I understand that you're still a bit above your target, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $980000. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $980000. This is as low as I can go, and I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $980000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $900000. I think this is a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm counteroffering at $990000. This is as low as I can go, and I hope we can finally come to an agreement.

I understand that we're getting close to your minimum price, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $920000. I think this is a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.

I'm not willing to go below my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one last concession, so I'm counteroffering at $995000. This is the absolute lowest I can go, and I hope we can finally come to an agreement.
I'm afraid I've reached my maximum budget, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $925000, but no further. I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on a price.
